item.description:
Free yourself from the demands of your ego - your attachment to thoughts, emotions, fears, body demands, your history, addictions and self-absorption. You are more than your personality and individual needs. Live life from an expanded place of joy, letting go, ease and passion without attachment.

Herb Pearce has taught spiritual development courses for many years.

Option for a great macrobiotic meal at 7pm for an additional $20. 1 day advance notice helpful.


617 964 2951, msarndt@verizon.net to reserve dinner

www.davidsnieckus/dinners.php


To register: Call Herb Pearce 617 794 7213cell, or email herb@herbpearce.com

8:30 pm - 10:00 pm
($30-15 Sliding scale based on ability to pay)
item.how_to_find_us: 1 mile from Newton Marriott in Auburndale section on Newton (near the Pike), Exit 24 off of 95, go 1 mile on Rt. 30, left on Robinwood Rd just after bridge, go 2 blocks and right on Crescent. Go to 5th house, down long driveway in back
item.name: Spiritual Freedom
